reaction.name: Uncanny Dodge
entries: The thief halves the damage that it takes from an attack that hits it. The thief must be able to see the attacker.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When it reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the maw demon can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: Fear Aura
entries: Any beast or humanoid that starts its turn within 10 feet of the meenlock must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the start of the creature's next turn.

trait.name: Light Sensitivity
entries: While in bright light, the meenlock has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on sight.

trait.name: Shadow Teleport {@recharge 5}
entries: As a bonus action, the meenlock can teleport to an unoccupied space within 30 feet of it, provided that both the space it's teleporting from and its destination are in dim light or darkness. The destination need not be within line of sight.

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 2d4 + 2})劈砍傷害, and the target must succeed on a DC 11 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition paralyzed} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: mind flayer在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}15 ({@damage 2d10 + 4}) psychic damage. If the target is Medium or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 15) and must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until this grapple ends.

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎， one {@condition incapacitated} humanoid {@condition grappled} by the mind flayer. {@h}The target takes 55 ({@damage 10d10}) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the mind flayer kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

action.name: Mind Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: The mind flayer magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 15 Intelligence saving throw or take 22 ({@damage 4d8 + 4}) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. A creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The mind flayer is a 10th-level spellcaster. Its innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 15; {@hit 7} to hit with spell attacks). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Telepathic Hub
entries: When the mindwitness receives a telepathic message, it can telepathically share that message with up to seven other creatures within 600 feet of it that it can see.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The mindwitness makes two attacks: one with its tentacles and one with its bite.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}16 ({@damage 4d6 + 2})穿刺傷害。

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}20 ({@damage 4d8 + 2}) psychic damage. if the target is Large or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 13) and must succeed on a DC 13 Intelligence saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until this grapple ends.

action.name: Eye Rays
entries: Eye Rays. The mindwitness shoots three of the following magical eye rays at random (reroll duplicates), choosing one to three targets it can see within 120 feet of it:

1. Aversion Ray: The targeted creature must make a DC 13 Charisma saving throw. On a failed save, the target has disadvantage on attack rolls for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

2. Fear Ray: The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
3. Psychic Ray: The target must succeed on a DC 13 Intelligence saving throw or take 27 ({@damage 6d8}) psychic damage.

4. Slowing Ray: The targeted creature must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw. On a failed save, the target's speed is halved for 1 minute. In addition, the creature can't take reactions, and it can take either an action or a bonus action on its turn but not both. The creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

5. Stunning Ray: The targeted creature must succeed on a DC 13 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the start of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

6. Telekinetic Ray: If the target is a creature, it must make a DC 13 Strength saving throw. On a failed save, the mindwitness moves it up to 30 feet in any direction, and it is {@condition restrained} by the ray's telekinetic grip until the start of the mindwitness's next turn or until the mindwitness is {@condition incapacitated}.

If the target is an object weighing 300 pounds or less that isn't being worn or carried, it is telekinetically moved up to 30 feet in any direction. The mindwitness can also exert fine control on objects with this ray, such as manipulating a simple tool or opening a door or a container.

monster.name: Morkoth
monster.senses: 盲視30呎, 黑暗視覺120呎

trait.name: 兩棲
entries: morkoth可以在空氣和水中呼吸。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The morkoth makes three attacks: two with its bite and one with its tentacles or three with its bite.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}9 ({@damage 2d6 + 2})劈砍傷害。

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及15呎，單一目標。{@h}15 ({@damage 3d8 + 2})鈍擊傷害, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 14) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends. the target is {@condition restrained} and takes 15 ({@damage 3d8 + 2})鈍擊傷害 at the start of each of the morkoth's turns. and the morkoth can't use its tentacles on another target.

action.name: Hypnosis
entries: The morkoth projects a 30-foot cone of magical energy. Each creature in that area must make a DC 17 Wisdom saving throw. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition charmed} by the morkoth for 1 minute. While {@condition charmed} in this way, the target tries to get as close to the morkoth as possible, using its actions to Dash until it is within 5 feet of the morkoth. A {@condition charmed} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns and whenever it takes damage, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a creature's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the creature has advantage on saving throws against the morkoth's Hypnosis for 24 hours.

reaction.name: Spell Reflection
entries: If the morkoth makes a successful saving throw against a spell, or a spell attack misses it, the morkoth can choose another creature (including the spellcaster) it can see within 120 feet of it. The spell targets the chosen creature instead of the morkoth. If the spell forced a saving throw, the chosen creature makes its own save. If the spell was an attack, the attack roll is rerolled against the chosen creature.

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: The morkoth is an 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (save DC 17, {@hit 9} to hit with spell attacks). The morkoth has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Mouth of Madness
entries: The giant is immune to {@spell 困惑術} spells and similar magic.

On each of its turns, the giant uses all its movement to move toward the nearest creature or whatever else it might perceive as food. Roll a {@dice d10} at the start of each of the giant's turns to determine its action for that turn:

1–3. The giant makes three attacks with its fists against one random target within its reach. If no other creatures are within its reach, the giant flies into a rage and gains advantage on all attack rolls until the end of its next turn.
4–5. The giant makes one attack with its fist against every creature within its reach. If no other creatures are within its reach, the giant makes one fist attack against itself.

6–7. The giant makes one attack with its bite against one random target within its reach. If no other creatures are within its reach, its eyes glaze over and it becomes {@condition stunned} until the start of its next turn.

8–10. The giant makes three attacks against one random target within its reach: one attack with its bite and two with its fists. If no other creatures are within its reach, the giant flies into a rage and gains advantage on all attack rolls until the end of its next turn.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}15 ({@damage 3d6 + 5}) piercing damage, and the giant magically regains hit points equal to the damage dealt.

action.name: Fist
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 8}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}18 ({@damage 3d8 + 5})鈍擊傷害。

trait.name: Grim Harvest (1/Turn)
entries: When necromancer kills a creature that is neither a construct nor undead with a spell of 1st level or higher, the necromancer regains hit points equal to twice the spell's level, or three times if it is a necromancy spell.

action.name: Withering Touch
entries: {@atk ms} {@hit 7} to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. {@h}5 ({@damage 2d4}) necrotic damage.

trait.name: Creature Sense
entries: The neothelid is aware of the presence of creatures within 1 mile of it that have an Intelligence score of 4 or higher. It knows the distance and direction to each creature, as well as each creature's Intelligence score, but can't sense anything else about it. A creature protected by a mind blank spell, a nondetection spell, or similar magic can't be perceived in this manner.

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: neothelid在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 13}，觸及15呎，單一目標。{@h}21 ({@damage 3d8 + 8})鈍擊傷害 plus 13 ({@damage 3d8}) psychic damage. If the target is a Large or smaller creature, it must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be swallowed by the neothelid. A swallowed creature is {@condition blinded} and {@condition restrained}, it has total cover against attacks and other effects outside the neothelid, and it takes 35 ({@damage 10d6}) acid damage at the start of each of the neothelid's turns.

If the neothelid takes 30 damage or more on a single turn from a creature inside it, the neothelid must succeed on a DC 18 Constitution saving throw at the end of that turn or regurgitate all swallowed creatures, which fall {@condition prone} in a space within 10 feet of the neothelid. If the neothelid dies, a swallowed creature is no longer {@condition restrained} by it and can escape from the corpse by using 20 feet of movement, exiting {@condition prone}.

action.name: Acid Breath {@recharge 5}
entries: The neothelid exhales acid in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 35 ({@damage 10d6}) acid damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

A creature {@condition charmed} in this way must use its action praising the nilbog. The nilbog can't regain hit points, including through magical healing, except through its Reversal of Fortune reaction.

trait.name: Nimble Escape

entries: When the orc is reduced to 0 hit points, it explodes, and any creature within 10 feet of it must make a DC 13 Constitution saving throw. A creature {@condition poisoned} by this effect can repeat the save at the end of each of its turn, ending the effect on itself on a success. entries: The sea spawn makes three attacks: two unarmed strikes and one with its Piscine Anatomy.

action.name: 徒手打擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: Piscine Anatomy
entries: The sea spawn has one or more of the following attack options, provided it has the appropriate anatomy:

items.name: Bite.
items.entry: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}4 ({@damage 1d4 + 2})穿刺傷害。

items.name: Poison Quills.
items.entry: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}3 ({@damage 1d6})毒素傷害, and the target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

items.name: Tentacle.
items.entry: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})鈍擊傷害, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 12) if it is a Medium or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the sea spawn can't use this tentacle on another target.

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks while in dim light or darkness

trait.name: Ethereal Awareness
entries: The shadow mastiff can see ethereal creatures and objects.

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The shadow mastiff has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Shadow Blend
entries: While in dim light or darkness, the shadow mastiff can use a bonus action to become {@condition invisible}, along with anything it is wearing or carrying. The invisibility lasts until the shadow mastiff uses a bonus action to end it or until the shadow mastiff attacks, is in bright light, or is {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Sunlight Weakness
entries: While in bright light created by sunlight, the shadow mastiff has disadvantage on attack rolls, ability checks, and saving throws.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3}) piercing damage. If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 13 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

variant.name: Shadow Mastiff Alpha
entries: A shadow mastiff alpha has the statistics of a normal shadow mastiff, with the following modifications:

items: The alpha has above average (42–54) hit points.
It has the Terrifying Howl action option described below.

entries.name: Terrifying Howl
entries: The shadow mastiff howls. Any beast or humanoid within 300 feet of the mastiff and able to hear its howl must succeed on a DC 11 Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} for 1 minute. A {@condition frightened} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to any shadow mastiff's Terrifying Howl for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: Rampage
entries: When it reduces a creature to 0 hit points with a melee attack on its turn, the shoosuva can take a bonus action to move up to half its speed and make a bite attack.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The shoosuva makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its tail stinger.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}26 ({@damage 4d10 + 4})穿刺傷害。

action.name: Tail Stinger
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及15呎，單一生物。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d8 + 4}) piercing damage, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned}. While {@condition poisoned}, the target is also {@condition paralyzed}. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

monster.name: Slithering Tracker
monster.languages: understands languages it knew in its previous form but can't speak

trait.name: Ambusher
entries: In the first round of a combat, the slithering tracker has advantage on attack rolls against any creature it surprised.

trait.name: Damage Transfer
entries: While grappling a creature, the slithering tracker takes only haIf the damage dealt to it, and the creature it is grappling takes the other half.

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the slithering tracker remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from a puddle, unless an observer succeeds on a DC 18 Intelligence (Investigation) check.

trait.name: Keen Tracker
entries: The slithering tracker has advantage on Wisdom checks to track prey.

trait.name: Liquid Form
entries: The slithering tracker can enter an enemy's space and stop there. It can also move through a space as narrow as 1 inch wide without squeezing.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The slithering tracker can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

trait.name: Watery Stealth
entries: While underwater, the slithering tracker has advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks made to hide, and it can take the Hide action as a bonus action.

action.name: 猛擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: Life Leech
entries: One Large or smaller creature that the slithering tracker can see within 5 feet of it must succeed on a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition grappled} (escape DC 13). Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained} and unable to breathe unless it can breathe water. In addition, the {@condition grappled} target takes 16 ({@damage 3d10}) necrotic damage at the start of each of its turns. The slithering tracker can grapple only one target at a time.

monster.name: Spawn of Kyuss
monster.languages: understands the languages it knew in life but can't speak

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The spawn of Kyuss regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight or a body of running water. If the spawn takes acid, fire, or radiant damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the spawn's next turn. The spawn is destroyed only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Worms
entries: If the spawn of Kyuss is targeted by an effect that cures disease or removes a curse, all the worms infesting it wither away, and it loses its Burrowing Worm action.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The spawn of Kyuss makes two attacks with its claws and uses Burrowing Worm.

action.name: Burrowing Worm
entries: A worm launches from the spawn of Kyuss at one humanoid that the spawn can see within 10 feet of it. The worm latches onto the target's skin unless the target succeeds on a DC 11 Dexterity saving throw. The worm is a Tiny undead with AC 6, 1 hit point, a 2 (-4) in every ability score, and a speed of 1 foot. While on the target's skin, the worm can be killed by normal means or scraped off using an action (the spawn can use this action to launch a scraped-off worm at a humanoid it can see within 10 feet of the worm). Otherwise, the worm burrows under the target's skin at the end of the target's next turn, dealing l piercing damage to it. At the end of each of its turns thereafter, the target takes 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage per worm infesting it (maximum of {@dice 10d6}). A worm-infested target dies if it drops to 0 hit points, then rises 10 minutes later as a spawn of Kyuss. If a worm-infested creature is targeted by an effect that cures disease or removes a curse, all the worms infesting it wither away.

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})劈砍傷害 plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) necrotic damage.

action.name: 尾擊
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}26 ({@damage 6d6 + 5})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 衝鋒
entries: 若野牛向著一個目標直線移動至少20呎並接著在同回合以一次角撞攻擊命中它，則目標將受到額外的7 ({@damage 2d6})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: 惡臭
entries: 任何除了惡臭野牛以外，在距離惡臭野牛5呎內開始它回合的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 12的體質豁免，否則陷入{@condition 中毒}狀態直到該生物的下個回合開始。若此豁免成功，該生物將免疫於所有惡臭野牛的惡臭長達1小時。

action.name: 角撞
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d6 + 4})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: Dreamwalker's Charm
entries: An enemy that starts its turn within 30 feet of the giant must make a DC 13 Charisma saving throw, provided that the giant isn't {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition charmed} by the giant. A creature {@condition charmed} in this way can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. Once it succeeds on the saving throw, the creature is immune to this giant's Dreamwalker's Charm for 24 hours.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The giant makes two attacks with its greatclub.

action.name: Greatclub
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 10}，觸及15呎，單一目標。{@h}19 ({@damage 3d8 + 6})鈍擊傷害。

action.name: Petrifying Touch
entries: The giant touches one Medium or smaller creature within 10 feet of it that is {@condition charmed} by it. The target must make a DC 17 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, the target becomes {@condition petrified}, and the giant can adhere the target to its stony body. Greater restoration spells and other magic that can undo petrification have no effect on a {@condition petrified} creature on the giant unless the giant is dead, in which case the magic works normally, freeing the {@condition petrified} creature as well as ending the {@condition petrified} condition on it.

action.name: Rock
entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 10}，射程60/240呎，單一目標。{@h}28 ({@damage 4d10 + 6})鈍擊傷害。 If the target is a creature, it must succeed on a DC 17 Strength saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

trait.name: 兩棲
entries: giant可以在空氣和水中呼吸。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The giant makes two Lightning Sword attacks or uses Wind Javelin twice.

action.name: Lightning Sword
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 14}，觸及15呎，單一目標。{@h}40 ({@damage 9d6 + 9}) lightning damage.

action.name: Windjavelin
entries: The giant coalesces wind into a javelin-like form and hurls it at a creature it can see within 600 feet of it. The javelin is considered a magic weapon and deals 19 ({@damage 3d6 + 9}) piercing damage to the target, striking unerringly. The javelin disappears after it hits.

legendary.name: Gust
entries: The giant targets a creature it can see within 60 feet of it and creates a magical gust of wind around it. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Strength saving throw or be pushed up to 20 feet in any horizontal direction the giant chooses.

legendary.name: Thunderbolt (2 Actions)
entries: The giant hurls a thunderbolt at a creature it can see within 600 feet of it. The target must make a DC 18 Dexterity saving throw, taking 22 ({@damage 4d10}) thunder damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

legendary.name: One with the Storm (3 Actions)
entries: The giant vanishes, dispersing itself into the storm surrounding its lair. The giant can end this effect at the start of any of its turns, becoming a giant once more and appearing in any location it chooses within its lair. While dispersed, the giant can't take any actions other than lair actions, and it can't be targeted by attacks, spells, or other effects. The giant can't use this ability outside its lair, nor can it use this ability if another creature is using a control weather spell or similar magic to quell the storm.

trait.name: 照明
entries: As a bonus action, the swarm can shed dim light from its brains in a 5-foot radius, increase the illumination to bright light in a 5 to 20-foot radius (and dim light for an additional number of feet equal to the chosen radius), or extinguish the light.

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny rat. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

trait.name: 心靈帷幕
entries: The swarm is immune to any effect that would sense its emotions or read its thoughts. as well as to all divination spells.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及0呎， one target in the swarm's space. {@h}14 ({@damage 4d6}) piercing damage, or 7 ({@damage 2d6}) piercing damage if the swarm has half of its hit points or fewer.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The swarm's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 13). As long as it has more than half of its hit points, it can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

trait.name: Swarm
entries: The swarm can occupy another creature's space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny maggot. The swarm can't regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.

action.name: Bites
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 0}，觸及0呎， one creature in the swarm's space. {@h}The target is infested by {@dice 1d4} rot grubs. At the start of each of the target's turns, the target takes {@dice 1d6} piercing damage per rot grub infesting it. Applying fire to the bite wound before the end of the target's next turn deals 1 fire damage to the target and kills these rot grubs. After this time, these rot grubs are too far under the skin to be burned. If a target infested by rot grubs ends its turn with 0 hit points, it dies as the rot grubs burrow into its heart and kill it. Any effect that cures disease kills all rot grubs infesting the target.

monster.name: Swashbuckler
monster.languages: 任意一種語言（通常為通用語）

trait.name: Lightfooted
entries: The swashbuckler can take the Dash or Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Suave Defense
entries: While the swashbuckler is wearing light or no armor and wielding no shield, its AC includes its Charisma modifier.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The swashbuckler makes three attacks: one with a dagger and two with its rapier.

action.name: 匕首
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎 或 射程20/60呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d4 + 4})穿刺傷害。

action.name: Rapier
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})穿刺傷害。

trait.name: Aggressive
entries: As a bonus action, the tanarukk can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: tanarukk在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The tanarukk makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its greatsword.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 1d8 + 4})穿刺傷害。

action.name: Greatsword
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4})劈砍傷害。

reaction.name: Unbridled Fury
entries: In response to being hit by a melee attack, the tanarukk can make one melee weapon attack with advantage against the attacker.

trait.name: Plant Camouflage
entries: The thorny has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The thorny regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes cold, fire, or necrotic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the thorny's next turn. The thorny dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 3}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}8 ({@damage 2d6 + 1})穿刺傷害。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The tlincalli makes two attacks: one with its longsword or spiked chain, and one with its sting.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}7 ({@damage 1d8 + 3})劈砍傷害, or 8 ({@damage 1d10 + 3})劈砍傷害 if used with two hands.

action.name: Spiked Chain
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) piercing damage, and the target is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 11) if it is a Large or smaller creature. Until this grapple ends, the target is {@condition restrained}, and the tlincalli can't use the spiked chain against another target.

action.name: Sting
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺傷害加 14 ({@damage 4d6})毒素傷害, and the target must succeed on a DC 14 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned} for 1 minute. If it fails the saving throw by 5 or more, the target is also {@condition paralyzed} while {@condition poisoned}. The target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: Transmuter's Stone
entries: The transmuter carries a magic stone it crafted that grants its bearer one of the following effects:
Darkvision out to a range of 60 feet
An extra 10 feet of speed while the bearer is unencumbered
Proficiency with Constitution saving throws
Resistance to acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder damage (transmuter's choice whenever the transmuter chooses this benefit)
If the transmuter has the stone and casts a transmutation spell of 1st level or higher, it can change the effect of the stone.

action.name: 長棍
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 2}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}2 ({@damage 1d6 - 1})鈍擊傷害，或若以雙手使用時 3 ({@damage 1d8 - 1})鈍擊傷害。

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: The transmuter is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 14, {@hit 6} to hit with spell attacks). The transmuter has the following wizard spells prepared:
footerEntries: *一環或更高環的變化系法術

trait.name: False Appearance
entries: While the trapper is attached to a ceiling, floor, or wall and remains motionless, it is almost indistinguishable from an ordinary section of ceiling, floor, or wall. A creature that can see it and succeeds on a DC 20 Intelligence (Investigation) or Intelligence (Nature) check can discern its presence.

trait.name: Spider Climb
entries: The trapper can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

action.name: Smother
entries: One Large or smaller creature within 5 feet of the trapper must succeed on a DC 14 Dexterity saving throw or be {@condition grappled} (escape DC 14). Until the grapple ends, the target takes 17 ({@damage 4d6 + 3})鈍擊傷害 plus 3 ({@damage 1d6}) acid damage at the start of each of its turns. While {@condition grappled} in this way, the target is {@condition restrained}, {@condition blinded}, and at risk of suffocating. The trapper can smother only one creature at a time.

trait.name: Creature Sense
entries: The ulitharid is aware of the presence of creatures within 2 miles of it that have an Intelligence score of 4 or higher. It knows the distance and direction to each creature, as well as each creature's intelligence score, but can't sense anything else about it. A creature protected by a mind blank spell, a nondetection spell, or similar magic can't be perceived in this manner.

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: ulitharid在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: Psionic Hub
entries: If an elder brain establishes a psychic link with the ulitharid, the elder brain can form a psychic link with any other creature the ulitharid can detect using its Creature Sense. Any such link ends if the creature falls outside the telepathy ranges of both the ulitharid and the elder brain. The ulitharid can maintain its psychic link with the elder brain regardless of the distance between them, so long as they are both on the same plane of existence. lithe ulitharid is more than 5 miles away from the elder brain, it can end the psychic link at any time (no action required).

action.name: Tentacles
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及10呎，單一生物。{@h}27 ({@damage 4d10 + 5}) psychic damage. If the target is Large or smaller, it is {@condition grappled} (escape DC 14) and must succeed on a DC 17 Intelligence saving throw or be {@condition stunned} until this grapple ends.

action.name: Extract Brain
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 9}，觸及5呎， one {@condition incapacitated} humanoid {@condition grappled} by the ulitharid. {@h}55 ({@damage 10d10}) piercing damage. If this damage reduces the target to 0 hit points, the ulitharid kills the target by extracting and devouring its brain.

action.name: Mind Blast {@recharge 5}
entries: The ulitharid magically emits psychic energy in a 60-foot cone. Each creature in that area must succeed on a DC 17 Intelligence saving throw or take 31 ({@damage 4d12 + 5}) psychic damage and be {@condition stunned} for 1 minute. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting (Psionics)
headerEntries: The ulitharid's innate spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 17). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no components:

monster.name: Vargouille
monster.languages: understands Abyssal, Infernal, and any languages it knew before becoming a vargouille but can't speak

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害加 10 ({@damage 3d6})毒素傷害。

action.name: Kiss
entries: The vargouille kisses one {@condition incapacitated} humanoid within 5 feet of it. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Charisma saving throw or become cursed. The cursed target loses 1 point of Charisma after each hour, as its head takes on fiendish aspects. The curse doesn't advance while the target is in sunlight or the area of a daylight spell; don't count that time. When the cursed target's Charisma becomes 2, it dies, and its head tears from its body and becomes a new vargouille. Casting remove curse, greater restoration, or a similar spell on the target before the transformation is complete can end the curse. Doing so undoes the changes made to the target by the curse.

action.name: Stunning Shriek
entries: The vargouille shrieks. Each humanoid and beast within 30 feet of the vargouille and able to hear it must succeed on a DC 12 Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of the vargouille's next turn. While {@condition frightened} in this way, a target is {@condition stunned}. If a target's saving throw is successful or the effect ends for it, the target is immune to the Stunning Shriek of all vargouilles for 1 hour.

trait.name: Plant Camouflage
entries: The vegepygmy has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The vegepygmy regains 3 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes cold, fire, or necrotic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vegepygmy's next turn. The vegepygmy dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The vegepygmy regains 5 hit points at the start of its turn. If it takes cold, fire, or necrotic damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the vegepygmy's next turn. The vegepygmy dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The vegepygmy makes two attacks with its claws or two melee attacks with its spear.

action.name: 爪抓
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})劈砍傷害。

action.name: Spear
entries: {@atk mw,rw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎 或 射程20/60呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2}) piercing damage, or 6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) piercing damage if used with two hands to make a melee attack.

action.name: Spores (1/Day)
entries: A 15-foot-radius cloud of toxic spores extends out from the vegepygmy. The spores spread around corners. Each creature in that area that isn't a plant must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or be {@condition poisoned}. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, a target takes 9 ({@damage 2d8})毒素傷害 at the start of each of its turns. A target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

trait.name: 群體戰術
entries: 若迅猛龍有至少一個隊友距離目標生物5呎內且該隊友並未{@condition 無力}，則迅猛龍在對該生物進行的攻擊檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 迅猛龍進行二次攻擊，一次啃咬，一次爪抓。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一生物。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d6 + 2})穿刺傷害。

entries: In response to taking damage, the warlock turns {@condition invisible} and teleports up to 60 feet to an unoccupied space it can see. It remains {@condition invisible} until the start of its next turn or until it attacks, makes a damage roll, or casts a spell.

trait.name: Indomitable (3/Day)
entries: The warlord can reroll a saving throw it fails. It must use the new roll.

trait.name: Survivor
entries: The warlord regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 hit point but fewer hit points than half its hit point maximum.

entries: The warlord makes two weapon attacks.

entries: {@atk rw} 命中{@hit 7}，射程80/320呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})穿刺傷害。

legendary.name: Weapon Attack
entries: The warlord makes a weapon attack.

legendary.name: Command Ally
entries: The warlord targets one ally it can see within 30 feet of it. if the target can see and hear the warlord, the target can make one weapon attack as a reaction and gains advantage on the attack roll.

legendary.name: Frighten Foe (Costs 2 Actions)
entries: The warlord targets one enemy it can see within 30 feet of it. If the target can see and hear it, the target must succeed on a DC 16 Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of warlord's next turn.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: 龍獸進行二次攻擊，一次啃咬，一次尾擊。

action.name: 啃咬

trait.name: Magic Club
entries: In the wood woad's hand, its club is magical and deals 7 ({@damage 3d4}) extra damage (included in its attacks).

trait.name: Plant Camouflage
entries: The wood woad has advantage on Dexterity ({@skill Stealth}) checks it makes in any terrain with ample obscuring plant life.

trait.name: Regeneration
entries: The wood woad regains 10 hit points at the start of its turn if it is in contact with the ground. If the wood woad takes fire damage, this trait doesn't function at the start of the wood woad's next turn. The wood woad dies only if it starts its turn with 0 hit points and doesn't regenerate.

trait.name: Tree Stride
entries: Once on each of its turns, the wood woad can use 10 feet of its movement to step magically into one living tree within 5 feet of it and emerge from a second living tree within 60 feet of it that it can see, appearing in an unoccupied space within 5 feet of the second tree. Both trees must be Large or bigger.

action.name: 多重攻擊
entries: The wood woad makes two attacks with its club.

action.name: Club
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 7}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}14 ({@damage 4d4 + 4})鈍擊傷害。

entries: The xvart can take the Disengage action as a bonus action on each of its turns.

trait.name: Overbearing Pack
entries: The xvart has advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks to shove a creature if at least one of the xvart's allies is within 5 feet of the target and the ally isn't {@condition incapacitated}.

trait.name: Raxivort's Tongue
entries: The xvart can communicate with ordinary bats and rats, as well as giant bats and giant rats.

spellcasting.name: 施法
headerEntries: The xvart is a 3rd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save DC 11, {@hit 3} to hit with spell attacks). It regains its expended spell slots when it finishes a short or long rest. It knows the following warlock spells:

monster.name: Yeth Hound

resist.note: from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

monster.languages: understands Common, Elvish, and Sylvan but can't speak

trait.name: Keen Hearing and Smell
entries: The yeth hound has advantage on Wisdom ({@skill Perception}) checks that rely on hearing or smell.

trait.name: Sunlight Banishment
entries: If the yeth hound starts its turn in sunlight, it is transported to the Ethereal Plane. While sunlight shines on the spot from which it vanished, the hound must remain in the Deep Ethereal. After sunset, it returns to the Border Ethereal at the same spot, whereupon it typically sets out to find its pack or its master. The hound is visible on the Material Plane while it is in the Border Ethereal, and vice versa, but it can't affect or be affected by anything on the other plane. Once it is adjacent to its master or a pack mate that is on the Material Plane, a yeth hound in the Border Ethereal can return to the Material Plane as an action.

trait.name: Telepathic Bond
entries: While the yeth hound is on the same plane of existence as its master, it can magically convey what it senses to its master, and the two can communicate telepathically with each other.

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 6}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}11 ({@damage 2d6 + 4}) piercing damage, plus 14 ({@damage 4d6}) psychic damage if the target is {@condition frightened}.

action.name: Baleful Baying
entries: The yeth hound bays magically. Every enemy within 300 feet of the hound that can hear it must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or be {@condition frightened} until the end of the hound's next turn or until the hound is {@condition incapacitated}. A {@condition frightened} target that starts its turn within 30 feet of the hound must use all its movement on that turn to get as far from the hound as possible, must finish the move before taking an action, and must take the most direct route, even if hazards lie that way. A target that successfully saves is immune to the baying of all yeth hounds for the next 24 hours.

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: 咒恨者在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 恐蛇靈光
entries: 任何除了蛇或蛇人以外，由咒恨者所選擇，可以看見或聽見咒恨者，且在距離咒恨者30呎內開始它回合的生物都必須成功通過一次DC 17的睿知豁免，否則將因為蛇和蛇人而陷入{@condition 恐懼}。陷入{@condition 恐懼}的生物可以在它的每個回合結束時重複這個豁免檢定，若豁免成功則結束這個效果對它的影響。若一個目標成功通過該豁免檢定或結束這個效果對它的影響，則該目標將在接下來的24小時內免疫這個靈光的效果。

trait.name: 變形者
entries: 咒恨者可以使用它的動作以變形成一個巨型的巨蟒蛇，或變回它的真實型態。它在各個型態的數據保持不變。任何它所穿戴或攜帶的裝備並不會隨著變形發生轉變。

trait.name: 六首
entries: 咒恨者在睿知（{@skill 感知}）檢定和對抗{@condition 目盲}、{@condition 魅惑}、{@condition 耳聾}、{@condition 恐懼}、{@condition 震懾}、和被擊暈{@condition 昏迷}的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊 (限定咒恨者型態)
entries: 咒恨者進行二次爪抓攻擊，一次絞纏攻擊，和一次疾風連咬攻擊。

action.name: 爪抓 (限定咒恨者型態)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 10}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}13 ({@damage 2d6 + 6})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 絞纏
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 10}，觸及15呎，單一體型為大型或更小的生物。{@h}16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6})鈍擊傷害加 7 ({@damage 2d6})酸蝕傷害，且目標{@condition 被擒}(逃脫DC 16)。直到擒抱結束前，目標被{@condition 束縛}，且在它的每個回合開始時受到16 ({@damage 3d6 + 6})鈍擊傷害加 7 ({@damage 2d6})酸蝕傷害，且咒恨者不能絞纏另一個目標。

action.name: 疾風連咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 10}，觸及10呎，單一生物。{@h}27 ({@damage 6d6 + 6})穿刺傷害加 14 ({@damage 4d6})毒素傷害。

spellcasting.name: 天生施法 (限定咒恨者型態)
headerEntries: 咒恨者的天生施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 17）。它天生就可以施展以下法術，且無需任何材料構材：

variant.name: 強酸黏液
entries: 以一個附贈動作，蛇人可以使自己的身體覆蓋一層強酸黏液，持續1分鐘。任何觸碰到該蛇人、在距離它5呎內時以一次近戰攻擊命中它、或被該蛇人的絞纏攻擊命中的生物，都將受到5 ({@damage 1d10})酸蝕傷害。

variant.name: 變色皮膚
entries: 蛇人在為躲藏所進行的敏捷（{@skill 隱匿}）檢定中具有優勢。

variant.name: 蛻皮 (1/日)
entries: 蛇人能夠以一個附贈動作蛻皮，使它自己從擒抱、鐐銬、或其他束縛中掙脫。若蛇人在這之後花費1分鐘的時間吃掉它蛻下的皮，則它將回復等同於它生命值最大值一半的生命值。

trait.name: 精神抗性
entries: 雛獸守衛在對抗{@condition 魅惑}的豁免檢定中具有優勢，且魔法無法使它{@condition 麻痺}。

trait.name: 魯莽
entries: 在它的回合開始時，雛獸守衛可以讓它在該回合間進行的所有近戰武器攻擊具有優勢，但直到它的下個回合開始前，所有對它進行的攻擊檢定也都具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊

entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 4}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2})穿刺傷害。

entries: 當蛇人在它的回合以一次近戰攻擊第一次命中目標時，它可以對目標造成額外的16 ({@damage 3d10})精神傷害。

trait.name: 塞斯的祝福
entries: 當蛇人將一個敵人的生命值歸0時，該蛇人將獲得9點臨時生命值。

action.name: 多重攻擊 (限定蛇人型態)

entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})劈砍傷害。

spellcasting.name: 施法 (限定蛇人型態)
headerEntries: 蛇人是6級的施法者。它的施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 13，法術攻擊命中{@hit 5}）。它將在完成一次短休或長休時恢復它所有已消耗的法術位。它知曉以下契術師法術：

spells: {@spell 魔能爆} (射程300呎,每次傷害骰+3額外傷害)

entries: 蛇人在為躲藏所進行的敏捷（{@skill 隱匿}）檢定中具有優勢。

variant.name: 蛻皮 (1/日)
entries: 蛇人能夠以一個附贈動作蛻皮，使它自己從擒抱、鐐銬、或其他束縛中掙脫。若蛇人在這之後花費1分鐘的時間吃掉它蛻下的皮，則它將回復等同於它生命值最大值一半的生命值。

monster.name: 蛇人．夢魘語者
monster.senses: 黑暗視覺120呎（看透魔法黑暗）

trait.name: 變形者
entries: 蛇人可以使用它的動作以變形成一個中型的蛇，或變回它的真實型態。它在各個型態的數據保持不變。任何它所穿戴或攜帶的裝備並不會隨著變形發生轉變。當它死亡時，它將維持它當下的型態。

trait.name: 死亡毒牙 (2/日)
entries: 當蛇人在它的回合以一次近戰攻擊第一次命中目標時，它可以對目標造成額外的16 ({@damage 3d10})死靈傷害。

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: 蛇人在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

action.name: 多重攻擊 (限定蛇人型態)
entries: 蛇人進行一次絞纏攻擊和一次彎刀攻擊。

action.name: 絞纏
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及10呎，單一目標。{@h}10 ({@damage 2d6 + 3})鈍擊傷害，且目標{@condition 被擒}(逃脫DC 14)。直到擒抱結束前，目標被{@condition 束縛}，且蛇人不能絞纏另一個目標。

action.name: 彎刀 (限定蛇人型態)
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3})劈砍傷害。

action.name: 引發噩夢 (短休或長休之後充能)
action.tENG_name: Invoke Nightmare (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
entries: 蛇人喚醒一個距離它60呎內它所能看見的生物的噩夢，並創造出該生物最為恐懼的一個靜止幻象，這個幻像只會倍該生物所看見。目標必須進行一次DC 13的智力豁免。若豁免失敗，目標將受到11 ({@damage 2d10})精神傷害，且因該幻象而陷入{@condition 恐懼}，相信它是真實存在的。蛇人必須專注以維持幻象（如同專注於法術），該幻象最長可以持續1分鐘，且無法被傷害。目標可以在它的每個回合結束時重複進行這個豁免檢定，若豁免成功則結束這個幻象，豁免失敗時受到11 ({@damage 2d10})精神傷害。

spellcasting.name: 天生施法 (限定蛇人型態)
headerEntries: 蛇人的天生施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 13）。蛇人天生就可以施展以下法術，且無需任何材料構材：

spellcasting.name: 施法 (限定蛇人型態)
headerEntries: 蛇人是6級的施法者。它的施法屬性為魅力（法術豁免DC 13，法術攻擊命中{@hit 5}）。它將在完成一次短休或長休時恢復它所有已消耗的法術位。它知曉以下契術師法術：

spells: {@spell 魔能爆} (射程300呎,每次傷害骰+3額外傷害)

variant.name: 變色皮膚
entries: 蛇人在為躲藏所進行的敏捷（{@skill 隱匿}）檢定中具有優勢。

monster.name: 蛇人．深坑之主
monster.senses: 黑暗視覺120呎（看透魔法黑暗）

trait.name: 魔法抗性
entries: 蛇人在對抗法術和其他魔法效果的豁免檢定中具有優勢。

trait.name: 劇毒信徒 (1/日)
entries: 當蛇人在它的回合以一次近戰攻擊第一次命中目標時，它可以對目標造成額外的16 ({@damage 3d10})毒素傷害。

action.name: 多重攻擊 (限定蛇人型態)
entries: 蛇人使用它的蛇臂進行二次啃咬攻擊。

action.name: 啃咬
entries: {@atk mw} 命中{@hit 5}，觸及5呎，單一目標。{@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3})穿刺傷害加 7 ({@damage 2d6})毒素傷害。

action.name: 麥爾紹克之沉睡 (1/日)
entries: 蛇人選擇最多五個它所能看見且距離它60呎內的生物。每個目標都必須成功通過一次DC 13的體質豁免，否則陷入一陣魔法性的睡眠中並{@condition 昏迷}長達10分鐘。若一個睡著的目標受到傷害、或有人使用它的動作把睡眠者搖醒或拍醒，則它將會醒來。這個魔法睡眠對免疫{@condition 魅惑}的生物不會有任何效果。
